member.name: T:JetBrains.dotTrace.Api.CPUProfiler
member.summary: CPUProfiler class allows application developers to programmatically control the process of profiling their applications.

member.name: M:JetBrains.dotTrace.Api.CPUProfiler.Start
member.summary: Starts taking performance measurements for this application. Note that measurements are taken for all threads.

member.name: M:JetBrains.dotTrace.Api.CPUProfiler.Stop
member.summary: Stops taking performance measurements for this application. Current data will persist in memory so next time you start taking measurements the new data will be added to the current data.

member.name: M:JetBrains.dotTrace.Api.CPUProfiler.StopAndSaveSnapShot
member.summary: Stops taking performance measurements and opens snapshot with current data in the profiler. After opening the snapshot the measurements data are reset.

member.name: M:JetBrains.dotTrace.Api.CPUProfiler.StopAndDropSnapShot
member.summary: Stops taking performance measurements and resets current measurements data.

member.name: M:JetBrains.dotTrace.Api.CPUProfiler.DisableCurrentThread
member.summary: Disable performance measurements for current thread.
